message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000.
That's a bit steep for me.  I'd be willing to offer $850,000.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product for $1,100,000.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  How about we split the difference between our last offers,  $975,000?
I'm glad we're making progress, but $975,000 is still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm offering the product for $1,050,000.
I understand this is important to you.  How about we settle at $1,012,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me closer to my target price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm offering the product for $1,075,000.
This is getting down to the wire.  I can go as high as $1,043,750.  Take it or leave it.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm not willing to go below $1,075,000. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to get as close as possible to my minimum price. I'm offering the product for $1,090,000.
